metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1020001 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
yard before 0.9.20 allows path traversal.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-1020001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

yard - 0.9.20-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yard package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.20-1').
